Hydras/Kup/windlord/talon

Hydras Just arrived towards the BlackFortress  and opening comlink to his 
men he said "Here is Hydras, Try to sorrund the enemie... that will made 
them an easier target "

**********

"GEt it Tucson"said Kup" I'll try to  Start confution in their ranks"and 
looking at Straight shot said "Ready to give them a lesson???"


********
Talon looked at Night Shift and said "Dont worry about me, cover Tucson" 
then she opened fire against the enemies.


*******
"Take this"said Windlord while he took one his trasmetall feathers"This will 
help"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Sunday, December 19, 2010 11:02 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Operation Black Tower

Tucson wanted to be able to give all his comrades a victory that was long 
since well deserved.  But he could see that it would be difficult to 
achieve, but was still determined to carry out his promise.  He keeps an 
attentive ear out on the situation, while trying to get a silent com over to 
Windlord, Rat Trap, Kup, Straight Shot, and the others.  He starts by 
contacting Kup and his team.

" Tucson to Kup, over.  The enemy seems to be gaining ground but it could be 
some time before they reach us.  That could give you and your team time to 
mobilize and divise a strategy that best fits your needs.  I'm fully 
confident in your abilities to assemble a plan, and any imput you can give 
us is valuable.  But be careful, they could sneak up on us at any time."

Night Shift now helps Talon, by sticking close to her, as he too fires 
rounds but keeps a shield over Talon and himself.

" I got your back Talon, ain't gonna let no preds or cons take any pop shots 
at any of us!"

Tucson now contacts Rat Trap and Windlord.

" Tucson to Rat Trap and Windlord, over.  What's your position?"

Rat Trap responds.

"Umm, we didn't exactly get inta the fortress Wheels... We're tryn' but the 
only hole we could find was a crevace in the wall."

Tucson responds.

" As long as you're both safe, that's all that counts."

Rat Trap sighs.

"Ain't good enough Wheels, I want this ta work, not fail.  The only way ta 
get in is ta blast this wall, but that'll start a riot for sure, and we 
don't wanna do that."

Tucson thinks for a moment.

"Hmmm...  You're right about the shots, we wouldn't want to do that...  But 
a chemical agent, similar to acid, may be able to burn a way into that wall, 
without making any noise or disruptive movement.."

Rat Trap raises an optic.

"Ohhh yeahhhh, an acidic compound... Like the stuff in batteries..  Lemme 
see what I got under my fur, I know I kept some goodies under here...."

He digs into his fur, and grins.

"Bingo..  I found this while scrounging one day...  An old battery cell I 
picked up somewhere..  All we gotta do is open this up, get to the acidic 
chamber, and see if that eats through the wall.  Windlord, got anything 
sharp ta cut inta this?"

Back at the ark, Quickstride is taken aback by what is happening to him.

"What the?  Rodimus, is it me or did everything just go dark?  I don't like 
this...  Watch your back sir, This isn't good, whatever it is."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> The firepower reaching into the air is quite heavy! The skies are
> fairly lit with smoke, fire and bright lights as the Maximals and
> Autobots attempt to defend themselves and their position. EMP rounds,
> while missing their intended targets still disrupt the sweeps
> targeting locks for a moment a send their radar systems into temporary
> shut down. This allows Talon's weapons fire to find a home, brining
> down yet another sweep, leaving two of them in the air overhead.
>
> Meanwhile Tuscon is able to get an assessment of the situation as
> there are currently no combatants on the ground. The sweeps are down
> to two now, well under half the number they started out with. However
> he can see in the distance there are more sweeps rising from an open
> door at the tower, and there are others as well. He still can get a
> bead on the sweeps, but the others rising up he had met before â€“ the
> soldiers Cyclonus had brought the tower when Tuscon was trying to
> fight his way out. However as the tower is still many kilometers away
> it will take a little bit of time for them to reach his position.
>
> ***************************************************************************
>
> Meanwhile at the tower itself Rat Trap and Windlord are unable to find
> a true 'hole' in the tower itself. There does not appear to be any
> open vents or handy cracks that lead thier way in. All the vents are
> currently closed, firmly and securely, and they would need to be,
> after all this is a tower designed to descend into liquid rock.
> However they are able to find a spot where the walls on the upper
> tower jut out slightly, a small crevass. However it is very small, and
> it in no way leads into the tower itself, but it is merely a small
> cubby hole type structure.
>
> The only way discernable into the tower itself, short of blowing a
> hole in the wall, and judgingh by the material of the wall this would
> take a lot of firepower, the only way in is the large door that the
> soldiers had just left from - the door that is even now continuing to
> close.
>
> ***************************************************************************
>
> At the Ark there is no answer to Quickstride's challenge. The air that
> had rippled before stopped, or atleast it was no longer visible to
> him.
>
> "What do you see?" Rodimus' voice comes over the speaker. "My sensors
> aren't picking up anyth . . ." Rodimus' voice goes silent as the world
> around Quickstride goes completely dark. He cannot see anything, not
> even his hand in front of his face, nor can he hear anything, not even
> the sound of his own voice. It is like his audio and visual sensors
> have gone offline.
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
